WorkItem.Description: The PHPExcel_Cell_DataValidation::TYPE_LIST doesn't work correctly. When using $objValidation->setFormula1('"Item A,Item B,Item C"'); the list only contains one element named "Item A, Item B, Item C". It's works well under windows but not under MAC OS X. I have made a screenshot of the result for the test "/tests/15datavalidation.xlsx"
WorkItem.Summary: [Bug] List Data Validation does not work correctly in Excel 2007 in Mac OS X

Comments.Message: This sounds strange. What happens if you change the locale on MAC OS X from French(?) to English? Will that make the file open up correctly?
